items.text: Heartwood Craft is committed to protecting the privacy of our website visitors. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

content.scopedText:
Privacy
Your Privacy
Heartwood Craft is committed to protecting the privacy of our website visitors. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
Information Collection and Use
We may collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number, and project details when you fill out a contact form or request a quote. This information is used solely to respond to your inquiries and provide requested services. We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties.
Data Security
We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the Internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.
By using our website, you signify your acceptance of this privacy policy.

items.text: Custom Kitchens & Bathroom Remodeling with Your Trusted Bozeman Experts

content.scopedText:
Interiors
Interiors
Custom Kitchens & Bathroom Remodeling with Your Trusted Bozeman Experts
Bathroom Remodels
Create your personal spa retreat with our comprehensive bathroom remodeling services. From powder room updates to master suite transformations, we handle every aspect of bathroom renovation with precision and care.
Complete Bathroom Design Services
Bathroom Design & Space Planning
Our bathroom design process focuses on maximizing space efficiency while creating a relaxing, functional environment. We consider your daily routines, storage needs, and aesthetic preferences to create the perfect bathroom layout.
Custom Vanities & Storage
We design and build custom bathroom vanities that provide ample storage while serving as beautiful focal points. Our solutions include double vanities for shared spaces, floating vanities for modern aesthetics, and traditional styles for classic homes.
Tile Work & Floor Tile Installation
From subway tiles to natural stone, our skilled craftsmen install floor tile and wall tile with precision. We handle everything from waterproofing to final grouting, ensuring your bathroom surfaces are both beautiful and durable.
Shower & Tub Installation
Whether you prefer luxurious soaking tubs, walk-in showers, or combination units, we handle complete installation including plumbing, waterproofing, and finishing work. Our shower installations include custom glass doors, built-in niches, and premium fixtures.
Bathroom Lighting & Ventilation
Proper lighting and ventilation are crucial for bathroom functionality. We install vanity lighting, recessed lighting, exhaust fans, and natural light solutions that create bright, comfortable spaces while preventing moisture issues.
